review: Easy to connect. However when I moved it away from the modem (20 feet), the signal dropped. I have high speed FIOS and this shouldn't happen. The door to the other was open and it had a difficult time buffering. I was disappointed because I was thinking of getting another stick for the other room.  Now, I won't need to do this. I have to keep it near the modem.
